title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Ganbare! Keroppooz
original_name: けろけろけろっぴのがんばれ! けろっぴーず
sinopse: Kerropi and his friends are hectored when they have fun in the playground. Both of them agree to have a baseball competition. During the exercise, Junk quits the team because of their argument. Will they lose finally?
